definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: Today all that seems pale and thin and very far away.
sentences.chinese: 現在，一切都顯得疏落慘淡，一切都遠離我們而去。

sentences.english: The weak speaker madvertisementse a speech on the gloomy peak.
sentences.chinese: 脆弱的講話者在疏落的山峯上公佈了演說。

sentences.english: On his strong shoulders, mottled and spotted, shed the shadow of lunar light.
sentences.chinese: 斑駁月影，疏落地，撒滿他寬闊強健的肩膀。

sentences.english: During the depression; millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets.
sentences.chinese: 經濟疏落時期，有好幾百萬的賦閒者在街頭遊蕩。

sentences.english: Is the love from the war, scattered in the summer rain.
sentences.chinese: 是愛的離殤，疏落了夏日的煙雨。

sentences.english: The river was sparsely lined with willow trees.
sentences.chinese: 河邊疏疏落落有幾棵柳樹。

definition: numerous and close together/(of hair) luxuriant/(of woods) dense/(of gunfire) intense
uneven and jumbled (idiom); irregular and disorderly/in a tangled mess
to thin out gradually/to become fainter and fainter
variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
Kaoshu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
